name: John Montero
text: I was going to purchase a Solar kit from Home Depot. I had no clue what I was doing. I was lucky enough to come across Dave on Marketplace. Instead of getting a very small Solar setup that was just 200 watts I was able to get a 500 watt system. Dave helped me every step of the way. He really went the extra mile. Rocket City Solar is the place to go for all of your Solar needs. Especially is you are new to this and need some direction!!

resp.text: John, thanks for your kind words and I am glad things are working for you. Reach out to me if you need anything.

name: Charles Taylor
text: I didnt know much about solar, David made it really easy to understand and even sold me on a complete kit that was mostly plug and play for my conversion van. Good quality panels for a great price. Rocket City Solar is the only place I recommend if your just starting out or if you have been doing solar for years.

resp.text: Chuck, you did a great job on the van. It looks really good. I am glad to have been able to be a part of your conversion project.

name: Gordon Niessen
text: I picked up 4 Solar Panels from David to more than quadruple the power in my barn.  And for less than I paid for the previous system a few years ago.  David was also able to provide some odds and ends I needed.

resp.text: Thanks and glad to hear it, Gordon. Let me know if I can be of any assistance.
